value.contents:
body {transition: opacity ease-in 0.2s; } 
body[unresolved] {opacity: 0; display: block; overflow: hidden; position: relative; }

value.optimizedFileContents: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Raleway&display=swap');*{font-family:'Raleway',sans-serif;font-size:1.2rem;margin:0;padding:0;}.wrapper{margin:0 auto;width:100%;}.header-container{min-height:20vh;background-color:#192a27;}.content{max-width:60ch;padding:3rem 0;margin:auto;min-height:60vh;}nav,nav a{color:white;background-color:#192a27;text-align:center;}ul{list-style-type:none}nav ul{padding:0}nav ul li{display:inline-block;padding:0 10px 10px;}nav ul li a{font-size:1.2rem}@media  (max-width:768px){.content{padding:1rem}}

.content{display:flex;justify-content:center;text-align:center;margin:0 auto;}.content p{margin:0}.content .content-banner{padding:2rem 0;background:#fff;color:#192a27;margin:auto;max-width:960px;}.content .content-body{padding:4rem 0;margin:0 auto;background-color:#FFF;max-width:960px;}.content .content-footer{width:100vw;color:#fff;background-color:#192a27;margin:auto;padding:4rem 0;}.content .content-footer p{max-width:960px;margin:auto;}.content .content-footer a{color:#F9E7CA}.content img.screenshot{display:inline-block;width:80%;max-width:70%;}.content h4{margin:0}@media  (max-width:768px){.content .content-body{width:92%;margin:auto;display:flex;justify-content:center;padding:0;}.content .content-banner{width:90%;margin:auto;padding:2rem 1rem;}.content .content-footer{width:100%;font-size:18px;}.content .content-footer p{width:90%}}
